item.title: SPSA, Building the Strategy of Freedom
item.description: “Building the Strategy of Freedom” examines the impact of Jimmy Carter’s and Ronald Reagan’s national security strategies on international religious freedom. I argue that each attempted to use religious freedom in order to achieve larger national security goals.

item.title: ISA Midwest, Defender of the Faith
item.description: “Defender of the Faith” examines the impact of Dwight Eisenhower’s national security strategy on international religious freedom.

item.title: The End Strategic Restraint
item.description: Mike Pence says the era of strategic restraint is over. Pointing to the quarter-century since the United States first confronted North Korea over its attempts to build nuclear weapons, the vice president said a period of patience had followed.

item.title: A Blindsided U.S. Foreign Policy?
item.description: Blindside—U.S. Foreign Policy My post is up at Real Clear Defense. Close watching required: this issue isn’t going to go away any time soon.
